allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) for t in data.get\(''tree'', []\): p = t[''path''] if any\(x in p.lower\(\) for x in [''doc'', ''guide'', ''multi'', ''window'', ''page'']\): print\(p\) ")
Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json data = json.load\(sys.stdin\) tree = data.get\(''tree'', []\) print\(f''Total items: {len\(tree\)}''\) for t in tree[:30]: print\(t[''path'']\) ")
